features: CAPACITY: 14-Cup glass carafe holds 112 fluid ounces
CARAFE FEATURES: ergonomic comfort grip black handle, dripless spout, lid, and knuckle guard for added protection
WASHING INSTRUCTIONS: Wash carafe and lid in warm, soapy water and rinse thoroughly or place in the dishwasher on the upper rack only
BREWER MARKINGS: Carafe brewer markings range from 2-14 cups of liquid
COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with a wide range of our premium Cuisinart coffeemakers: DCC-2200, DCC-2600, DCC-2800, DCC-3200, and DCC-3200P1
body.description: Product Description Cuisinart 14 cup replacement glass carafe with a black lid and black and brushed chrome handle. This carafe is for use with DCC-2200 series and DCC-2600 coffeemakers. Brand Story By Cuisinart

productInformation.name: Material
productInformation.value: Brewed coffee markings for two to fourteen cups

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Our Mission is to help you 'Savor the Good Life.' Under management from Conair Corporation since 1989, the legacy is alive and well, as today, Cuisinart is a universally recognized name. The prestigious Cuisinart brand is not limited to food processors. The company is a full-service culinary resource with a wide array of products, preferred by chefs and favored by consumers. This needs to be more lifestyle focused it sounds like it ties to our archaic tagline a kitchen resource.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the original pot
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect, you wouldn’t know it’s not the original pit that came with the coffee maker! If you need a coffee pot for this coffee maker, I highly recommend this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought to replace Ninja DCM201 XL 14 cup carafe
reviews.reviewText: This works great as a replacement for the Ninja DCM201 XL 14 cup carafe that leaks all over the place. Ninja doesn't have any replacement carafes in stock so I had to look for an alternative. I think this carafe is WAY overpriced but we bought the Ninja coffee maker on sale so after spending an extra $35 for this carafe we are still under the "regular" price of the coffee maker. It pours nicely, no dripping, no burned feet, no mess. What it should be. What Ninja should've been.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a replacement, it works.
reviews.reviewText: Happy to be able to replace a broken coffee pot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, every few years it seems the glass carafe for my Cuisinart coffee maker breaks. I thought about getting a new machine but, decided just to replace the carafe. Still makes very good coffee!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got it quickly, cheaper than a whole new coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Replaced a carafe I accidentally cracked one Monday morning. Received by Wednesday so back in business before having to go back to work. Nice having a shiny clean carafe again (there were stains in the old one that I just couldn't get to come out). Worked like a charm in my Cuisinart coffee maker. While it did seem pricier than I anticipated, still cheaper than a whole new unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for kitchen aid coffee machine.
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived on time. The item is easy to clean by hand or by dishwasher. The item is easily replaced if it gets broken. The item gives 14 cups of coffee... The item is paired to the Kitchen Aid Coffee machine. The item keeps the coffee nice and warm. For example, coffee maker starts working at 6:30 am and hold the liquid hot/warm till 10:00 am. Impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the original carafe!
reviews.reviewText: I dropped and shatteredd the original carafe and was glad to find I could order a replacement for much less money than buying a whole new coffee maker, espescially since it's not very old. The original carafe would spill water as I would pour water into the basin. I always had to wipe water puddles off the counter. Not with this carafe! It doesn't drip one bit. Much better and I'm almost glad I broke the other one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mishandled original pot while cleaning, didn't think a replacement pot would be cost effective. Scurried down to my local Costco, where I purchased the original Cuisinart coffee maker, only to find that Costco has discontinued (at least for now) the unit. Plan B, find a replacement carafe on Amazon. Found an Amazon listing, but was concerned that that, although the number of maximum cups was the same, that the unit wouldn't fit. But, any port in a storm, so I ordered the Amazon replacement. Pot arrived the NEXT day! Exact fit, and I'm drinking a nice cup of home brewed coffee! Life's good! So's the coffee!
My coffee pot is 15 years old and this was the perfect replacement for my broken carafe
Quedo excelente en la cafetera aun y no siendo el codigo.. muy recomendada
Es el repuesto correcto para la jarra que se me rompió
